title: Can't access smurf account
body: I have a smurf account called God of Rengar I forgot the password to, I still remember the username but I made the account when I was 11 and the email is something like silentshaco67@gmail.com and I only ever used the email to make the account, and that was 6 years ago. I last changed the password like a year ago or so, I remember some previous passwords to the account if that helps at all. I don't remember if league accounts use security questions or recovery emails but if they do I can do that. If any more proof is needed just ask and I'll provide what I have

replies.body: As long as you can remember some key information about some of that account's activity (not including passwords, any hacker might be able to figure that out as well) we should be able to help you get back in that smurf! Reach out to our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to get that process started!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=biy91B4B,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-16T02:30:23.955+0000)
>
> As long as you can remember some key information about some of that account's activity (not including passwords, any hacker might be able to figure that out as well) we should be able to help you get back in that smurf! Reach out to our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to get that process started!

Thanks I made a ticket
